overview: Marines Flagg and Quirt fought together in WWI and Panama. After some time in New York they go to Sweden and compete for the love of Else. Next they go to Nicaragua and help earthquake victims. Then to Egypt where Else is now in Prince Hassan's harem.
tagline: FLAGG AND QUIRT SQUARING ACCOUNTS WITH EACH OTHER AROUND THE WORLD IN RAOUL WALSH'S "WOMEN OF ALL NATIONS"
title: Women of All Nations
